items.title: GTPL Hathway Q1 net profit drops 27% to 10.5 crore
items.description: GTPL Hathway reported a 27% decline in net profit, reaching Rs 10.5 crore for the quarter ended June, while revenue increased by 7% to Rs 909.1 crore. The cable TV business saw a slight revenue dip, but the subscriber base remained stable at 9.6 million. Broadband ARPU rose, and data consumption surged, with network expansion continuing.
